prompt: Design a 404 Not Found page with a dark purple background. Show '404' in bold white, a 'Lost Somewhere?' subtitle in light purple, and a white70 descriptive message. Add a purple 'Return Home' button with rounded corners. Place a small star icon to the right of the '404' text using a Stack layout. Center all content in a Column with 24.0 padding. Use a Scaffold with the dark purple background.
